subsection.name: Add Dependencies in Repository Web Application
subsection.p: Add the following dependencies into your Hippo CMS Web Application project.

div.source:
<properties> <!-- SNIP --> <forge.exdocpickerbase.version>0.01.00</forge.exdocpickerbase.version> <!-- SNIP --> </properties>
<repositories> <!-- SNIP --> <repository> <id>hipporepojcrdav-maven-repo</id> <name>Hippo CMS External Document Picker Base Maven 2 Repository</name> <url>http://forge.onehippo.org/svn/exdocpickerbase/maven2/</url> </repository> <!-- SNIP --> </repositories>
<dependencies> <!-- SNIP --> <dependency> <groupId>org.onehippo.forge.exdocpickerbase</groupId> <artifactId>exdocpickerbase-fieldpicker</artifactId> <version>${forge.exdocpickerbase.version}</version> </dependency> <!-- SNIP --> </dependencies>
